summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1625, for the improvement of Sixth Avenue Northeast and Seventh Avenue Northeast, each from the north line of East Forty-fifth Street to the south line of East Fiftieth Street; and East Forty-seventh Street, from Sixth Avenue Northeast to Seventh Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains and sewer therein, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 17255 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
